corkage.description: Corkage is $25 for bottles not on our list with a two bottle maximum per party

reservations.cancellation_policy: You have 24 hours to cancel reservations. If cancelled within 24 hours, there is a $25 fee per head
reservations.recommendation: We always recommend a reservation for the main dining room
reservations.walk_ins: We do take walk-ins however we always recommend a reservation for the main dining room

seating.window_requests: Window requests are taken however NEVER guaranteed as we do get many requests
seating.special_table: We have one round table in house that can seat up to 6 guests
seating.bar_lounge: Bar and Lounge are always open seating

dress_code.policy: No swimwear and no tank tops for men
dress_code.description: Dress code is no swimwear and no tank tops for men

faqs.question: What is your corkage policy?
faqs.answer: Corkage is $25 for bottles not on our list with a two bottle maximum per party.

faqs.question: What is your cancellation policy?
faqs.answer: You have 24 hours to cancel reservations. If cancelled within 24 hours, there is a $25 fee per head.

faqs.question: Do you take walk-ins?
faqs.answer: We do take walk-ins however we always recommend a reservation for the main dining room. Bar and Lounge are always open seating.

faqs.question: Can I request a window table?
faqs.answer: Window requests are taken however NEVER guaranteed as we do get many requests.

faqs.question: What is your dress code?
faqs.answer: Dress code is no swimwear and no tank tops for men.

faqs.question: Do you have any special seating options?
faqs.answer: We have one round table in house that can seat up to 6 guests. Bar and Lounge are always open seating.
